description: [Magic Hound](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0059) has identified high-value email accounts in academia, journalism, NGO's, foreign policy, and national security for targeting.(Citation: Proofpoint TA453 July2021)(Citation: Google Iran Threats October 2021)

external_references.description: Bash, A. (2021, October 14). Countering threats from Iran. Retrieved January 4, 2023.
Miller, J. et al. (2021, July 13). Operation SpoofedScholars: A Conversation with TA453. Retrieved August 18, 2021.
